dt: {bc}the science that deals with measuring time by regular divisions and that assigns to events their proper dates
{bc}an arrangement (as of events) in order of occurrence

dt.t: The book provides a {wi}chronology{/wi} of events leading up to the American Civil War.

shortdef: the science that deals with measuring time by regular divisions and that assigns to events their proper dates
a chronological table, list, or account
an arrangement (as of events) in order of occurrence
